title: Add 'Fast' font style and 'Print' label
message: Introduce a new 'fast' font style and corresponding UI control. CSS: add .fast-font, .target-char.fast-font (uses "Zhi Mang Xing", 1.4rem, preserves primary color) and .ghost-char.fast-font. JSX: rename the "Regular" button label to "Print", add a new Fast style button that triggers handleStyleChange('fast'), and move the Messy button after Fast. This provides a quick handwriting-style option in the character draw UI.
